Text: Any word on quality and is it safe?

quality is pretty much as good as the crappy old xvid codec allows for a movie from the 80's that was never intended to be on dvd.  and yes it is safe, but i'm kinda biased on this, since it is my upload >:)

I was on 1.1-1.0 mb/s constant download (the max i can get) up until the last ~.5%.

A:7
V:6

Not bad quality. Definitely worth the download.
